original: Elmer, Per Thure Valdemar, tele-grafkommissarie, Lysekil, f. 2/4/99 i Bergunda, Kronob. 1., av civ:ing. Per E. o. Hilma Lundgren. G. 42 m. Eli-se-Marie Hultin. — Stud:ex. v. Växjö h. a, 1. 19, telegr :v. und :visn :anst. 20. Telegr :komm :ie i Lysekil sed. 42. Medi. av Odd Fellov^^ sed. 43 o. av Ro-tarykl. 45.
translated: Elmer, Per Thure Valdemar, telegraph commissioner, Lysekil, born on April 2, 1899 in Bergunda, Kronoberg County, son of civil engineer Per E. and Hilma Lundgren. Married in 1942 to Eli-se-Marie Hultin. Passed high school exam at Växjö in 1919, worked as a telegraph assistant at the telegraph agency in 1920, became a telegraph commissioner in Lysekil in 1942. Awarded by the Odd Fellows in 1943 and the Rotary Club in 1945.
